title: Virginia Softball Comes Up Just Short of Series Win at Virginia Tech in Heartbreaking 5-4 Loss in Extra Innings - Sports Illustrated
content: Virginia Softball Comes Up Just Short of Series Win at Virginia Tech in Heartbreaking 5-4 Loss in Extra Innings  Sports Illustrated
description: Katie Goldberg homered in the top of the eighth, but the Hokies responded with two runs in the bottom of the inning to win the series in walk-off fashion
